entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
